name: Simply Dark Airdates
description:
A nice and fairly clean dark theme for Airdates. My version includes grey text and removes the white outlines for easier viewing.

Please note that any highlighted shows in the screenshot will not be highlighted on yours unless you choose them yourself.
additional_info:
Inspired by Sawyer's version "Darker Airdates." https://userstyles.org/styles/126618/darker-airdates

Changelog:
Added the option to pick between three font sizes
Fixed Archive color from white to the correct grey. 
Fixed Search Bar padding and color to correct grey.
